Node.value: Low amounts of chlorides, salt, moisture, direct sunlight?
Completely hidden away, dry, or insulated?
Mild and continually wet environment exposed to rain and sunlight?

Leaf.value: Low Alloy Steel Cu, Ni, Cr, etc

Node.value: Is the material used in chemical processing, oil refinery, vessels, pipes, broiler, heat exchanger or other harsh environment?
Is the material to be used in pharmaceutical or food industry where taste or color contamination is avoided?
Is material in contact with highly corrosive and hot environemnt? KOH, NaOH, HF, chloride productions, ammonia converters?
Is the material used in aerospace as airplane body or turbines?
Airplane wing covers, panels, fuselage skins or other body parts?
Moving or stationary parts within jet turbines?
High Strength stringers, frames, beams, or upper wing covers?

Leaf.value: Nickel Alloys Inconel Waspaloy Cobalt Alloys

Node.value: Temperatures below 300 C such as the fan or the compressor parts?

Leaf.value: Titanium Alloys Ti-6Al-4V Ti6-2-4-2 Cobalt Alloys

Node.value: High temperature and stress such as turbine blades, combustion chamber, or exhaust?
Is the material used in electronics as circuit-boards, wires, or covers etc.?
Is material to be used in automobiles?
Is the material used in underwater applications such as valves, pumps, or condensers?
Is the material to be used in recirculating steam, condenser or broiler?

Nickel 200,201,205,270 Cupro Nickel Copper 101, 102 Phosphor Bronze Nickel-Silver Alloy 770

Heating elements such as exhaust valves and glowplugs?
